title: David hopes to do in the future

content.question: What does David say he hopes to do in the future?

choices.label: Visit the site where the objects in the exhibit originated.
Give a presentation on the exhibit to the Chinese club.
Use what he learned from the exhibit for a school project.
Pursue research on the subject of the exhibit in college.

content.answer: Visit the site where the objects in the exhibit originated.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
